results.title: I capture the castle [electronic resource] : A BBC Radio 4 full-cast dramatisation. Dodie Smith.
abstracts: Toby Jones and Holliday Grainger star in a new BBC Radio 4 full-cast dramatisation of Dodie Smith's enduringly popular coming-of-age novel In the 1930s, seventeen-year-old Cassandra Mortmain lives in a crumbling ruin of a castle in the Suffolk countryside. Her father, an author wrestling with writer's block, spends his time reading detective stories; her bohemian stepmother Topaz is an artist's model, and her beautiful older sister Rose is determined to escape the poverty of their existence – ideally by marriage to a rich man. Intelligent and observant, Cassandra chronicles the eccentricities of her relations in her journal, in a bid to capture her family and their lives at the castle. When two rich American brothers, Simon and Neil Cotton, arrive unexpectedly, the family's isolation is disrupted. Rose accepts a marriage proposal from Simon, and as she is whisked off to a world of wealth in London, Cassandra is left to deal with the increasingly bizarre behaviour of her father – as well as her own feelings for Simon... Dodie Smith's charming, funny and poignant love story is a classic of 20th-Century English literature and this sparkling adaptation, starring Toby Jones and Holliday Grainger, will enchant and delight. Duration: 2 hours.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Hearts overboard [electronic resource]. Becky Dean.
abstracts: Set sail with this banter-filled rivals-to-lovers romance between a STEM-loving girl and a jock guy that will fill you with wanderlust...and have you rooting for love in the great outdoors! Love is on the horizon...  After a very public breakup during which her ex, Caleb, tells her she is both (a) boring and (b) stuck in her ways, Savannah Moore decides that going with her mom on her company cruise to Alaska presents the perfect opportunity to show people how fun she is. It won’t be easy, though. Her longtime nemesis, Tanner Woods, is also on the ship. His family and Savannah's are friends, and Tanner knows her better than she’d like to admit. When he learns of her plan, Tanner wants to help, and he encourages her to try everything: zip-lining and dogsledding, hiking the bear-infested Alaskan wilderness, singing late night karaoke, and taking a polar plunge. That’ll show Caleb just what he’s missing. Except after spending so much time with Tanner, Savannah’s not sure Caleb is the one she wants anymore...
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Romance,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Rules for rule breaking [electronic resource]. Talia Tucker.
abstracts: Booksmart  meets  Never Have I Ever  in this debut YA rom-com about two Korean American teens forced into a shared college visit road trip where they discover that the reasons they’ve been rivals their entire lives might actually be signs they’re a perfect pair.  Winter Park and Bobby Bae are Korean American high school juniors whose families have been friends since the kids were making crayon art. They, however, are repulsed by each other. Winter is MIT-bound, comfortable keeping people at arm’s length, and known by others as responsible, though she has a desire to let loose. This probably comes from her rebel grandmother, who is constantly pushing boundaries and encouraging Winter to do so as well. Winter’s best friend is moving abroad and won’t be attending college at all, and Winter’s wrestling with what it means to be left behind. Bobby is as Type-A, anxious, and risk-averse as you can get. He’s also been recently dumped, which has him feeling disoriented and untethered. That’s why, when Winter’s and Bobby’s parents insist that they go on a northeast college campus tour together, both teens find reasons to accept even though the idea of being stuck in a car together for 700 miles sounds unbearable. What awaits them is a journey of self-discovery, and the only rule on their road trip is to break all the rules. At first, this happens in hilariously calculated ways (using lists and reason and logic!), but they soon abandon that, challenging each other to dares in Virginia, getting high and wandering around Philly for food—and battling the subsequent digestive distress—and crashing a party in Cambridge. And, of course, realizing that they’re perfect together.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Romance,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Actually super [electronic resource]. Adi Alsaid.
abstracts: A globetrotting novel that takes a determined teen from Japan to Australia and to Argentina and Mexico on a quest to prove that humanity is more good than bad from the author of  Let’s Get Lost  and  Before Takeoff.   Isabel is having an existential crisis. She’s three years into high school, and everything she’s learned has only shaken her faith in humanity. Late one night, she finds herself drawn to a niche corner of the internet—a forum whose members believe firmly in one thing: that there are indeed people out in the world quietly performing impossible acts of heroism. You might even call them  supers . No, not in the comic book sense—these are real people, just like each of us, but who happen to have a power or two. If Isabel can find them, she reasons, she might be able to prove to herself that humanity is more good than bad. So, the day she turns 18, she sets off on a journey that will take her from Japan to Australia, and from Argentina to Mexico, with many stops along the way. She longs to prove one— just one— super exists to restore her hope for the future. Will she find what she’s looking for? And how will she know when—if—she does?.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Comic and Graphic Books,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: So many beginnings [electronic resource]. Bethany C Morrow.
abstracts: This program includes an author's note read by the author. Four young Black sisters come of age during the American Civil War in  So Many Beginnings,  a warm and powerful YA remix of the classic novel  Little Women , by national bestselling author Bethany C. Morrow. North Carolina, 1863 . As the American Civil War rages on, the Freedpeople's Colony of Roanoke Island is blossoming, a haven for the recently emancipated. Black people have begun building a community of their own, a refuge from the shadow of the "old life." It is where the March family has finally been able to safely put down roots with four young daughters: Meg, a teacher who longs to find love and start a family of her own. Jo, a writer whose words are too powerful to be contained. Beth, a talented seamstress searching for a higher purpose. Amy, a dancer eager to explore life outside her family's home. As the four March sisters come into their own as independent young women, they will face first love, health struggles, heartbreak, and new horizons. But they will face it all together.  A Macmillan Young Listeners Production from Feiwel & Friends    Praise for  So Many Beginnings: A Little Women Remix    "Morrow's ability to take the lingering stain of slavery on American history and use it as a catalyst for unbreakable love and resilience is  flawless . That she has remixed a canonical text to do so only  further illuminates the need to critically question who holds the pen in telling our nation's story ." — Booklist ,  starred review  " Bethany C. Morrow's prose is a sharpened blade in a practiced hand, cutting to the core of our nation's history.   ...   A devastatingly precise reimagining and a joyful celebration of sisterhood.  A narrative about four young women who unreservedly deserve the world, and  a balm for wounds to Black lives and liberty ." —Tracy Deonn,  New York Times- bestselling author of  Legendborn  "A  tender and beautiful  retelling that  will make you fall in love with the foursome all over again ." —Tiffany D. Jackson,  New York Times -bestselling author of  White Smoke  and  Grown.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Historical Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Layover [electronic resource]. Amy Andelson.
abstracts: Fans of Julie Buxbaum's  Tell Me Three Things  and Morgan Matson's  Since You've Been Gone  will get caught up in the drama of this road trip romance that begins with an unplanned flight layover in L.A. and turns into a wild adventure.    FLYNN:  At first we were almost strangers. But ever since I moved to New York, Amos was the one person I could count on. And together we were there for Poppy. (I mean, what kind of parents leave their kid to be raised by a nanny?) I just didn't expect to fall for him—and I never expected him to leave us.  AMOS:  I thought I was the only one who felt it. I told myself it was because we were spending so much time together—taking care of Poppy and all. But that night, I could tell she felt it, too. And I freaked out—you're not supposed to fall for your stepsister. So I ran away to boarding school. I should have told her why I was leaving, but every time I tried, it felt like a lie.  One missed flight was about to change their lives forever. . . .  Perfect for fans of  Clueless  and brought to you by two Hollywood screenwriters, this wild journey of unlikely romance, heartbreak, and adventure—set against the backdrop of a blended family in free fall during a rebellious layover in Los Angeles—reveals the true value of the unbreakable bonds we forge when we dare to let ourselves risk it all.  Readers:  Flynn, read by Phoebe Strole Amos, read by Michael Crouch Poppy, read by Cassandra Morris.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Romance,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: American heart [electronic resource]. Laura Moriarty.
abstracts: A powerful and thought-provoking YA debut from New York Times bestselling author Laura Moriarty.   Imagine a United States in which registries and detainment camps for Muslim-Americans are a reality.  Fifteen-year-old Sarah-Mary Williams of Hannibal, Missouri, lives in this world, and though she has strong opinions on almost everything, she isn't concerned with the internments because she doesn't know any Muslims. She assumes that everything she reads and sees in the news is true, and that these plans are better for everyone's safety.  But when she happens upon Sadaf, a Muslim fugitive determined to reach freedom in Canada, Sarah-Mary at first believes she must turn her in. But Sadaf challenges Sarah-Mary's perceptions of right and wrong, and instead Sarah-Mary decides, with growing conviction, to do all she can to help Sadaf escape.  The two set off on a desperate journey, hitchhiking through the heart of an America that is at times courageous and kind, but always full of tension and danger for anyone deemed suspicious.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: This one's for you [electronic resource]. Kate Sweeney.
abstracts: A gorgeous contemporary romance about two ex-best friends, Cass and Syd, on a life-altering road trip following the reunion tour of the Darlas—the band Cass’s mom was in when she died. Perfect for fans of Nina LaCour, Mary H.K. Choi, and Jandy Nelson.  After their high school graduation, former best friends Cass and Syd are gearing up for their futures. Cass has planned to go to college to become an engineer, while Syd—despite the fact that her family thinks she’s messed up her whole life—has lined up a sound internship at a historic music venue.   But Cass is keeping secrets. Though his dad has forbidden it, Cass has been playing music, taking trips to San Francisco BART stations to play and make money. Somehow, it’s become a way for Cass to connect with his mother—who was also a musician—who died in a drunk driving accident on the way back from a gig when he was one.   But after Syd catches Cass playing at the BART station, and Cass finds out his mom’s old band the Darlas is going on a reunion tour, everything changes. On impulse, Cass invites Syd to the first Darlas show, and without telling anyone, they make a break for it. Turning one show into a cross-country journey, the two former friends throw away all their plans for the future and embark on a life-altering road trip following the tour, keeping it a secret from their friends and family.   Along the way, they’ll untangle the messy threads of how they became “ex”-best friends, experience the power of nature and music, and decide what they really want their lives to be. Maybe, through it all, Cass and Syd can find a way back to each other, too.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Romance,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Before takeoff [electronic resource]. Adi Alsaid.
abstracts: The Sun Is Also a Star  meets  Jumanji  when two teens meet and fall in love during a layover-gone-wrong at the Atlanta airport in this thrilling new novel from the author of  Let's Get Lost !  James and Michelle find themselves in the Atlanta airport on a layover. They couldn't be more different, but seemingly interminable delays draw them both to a mysterious flashing green light—and each other.  Where James is passive, Michelle is anything but. And she quickly discovers that the flashing green light is actually... a button. Which she presses. Which may or may not unwittingly break the rules of the universe—at least as those rules apply to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta. Before they can figure up from down, strange, impossible things start happening: snowstorms form inside the B terminal; jungles sprout up in the C terminal; and earthquakes split the ground apart in between. And no matter how hard they try, it seems no one can find a way in or out of the airport. James and Michelle team up to find their families and either escape the airport, or put an end to its chaos—before it's too late.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Romance,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 邦锦美朵 [electronic resource] : Bang jin mei duo. 刘千.
abstracts: 纳姆、洛丹、修莫、谢玛拉青都是千户家的奴隶。为了救出 挣扎在千户铁蹄下的穷人，黑夜里，纳姆举着火炬，带着奴隶逃 跑，千户和家丁紧紧追赶，在千钩一发之际，纳姆用自己年轻的 生命，为奴隶铺了一条自由之路，而千户和家丁却走上了绝路。体现了美终将战胜邪恶的《邦锦美朵》一经问世，就受到了 画坛好评，创作完成的当年就获得了中央美术学院研究生班创 作一等奖，并被中国美术馆全套收蔵。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Blood of wonderland [electronic resource] : Queen of hearts series, book 2. Colleen Oakes.
abstracts: Revolution is rising in Wonderland. Dinah's battle has begun.   Colleen Oakes's twisted reimagining of the Queen of Hearts origin story continues in this thrilling sequel, Blood of Wonderland.  Dinah has been exiled from Wonderland. The vicious father she always feared has framed her for the brutal murder of her brother and turned the kingdom against her.   Now hiding in the lush and mysterious Twisted Wood with only her war steed at her side, Dinah is faced with a choice—to leave Wonderland forever, or stay and fight her father for the throne.   When a chance encounter with one of her father's long-lost enemies brings Dinah more allies than she ever could have imagined, war starts to feel inevitable. But before Dinah can lead her people into combat, she must confront certain truths about her heart and her destiny—no matter how dark those truths may be.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Fantasy,Young Adult Literature

results.title: War of the cards [electronic resource]. Colleen Oakes.
abstracts: Colleen Oakes's twisted reimagining of the Queen of Hearts origin story comes to a thrilling conclusion in War of the Cards.   Dinah has lost everyone she ever loved. Her brother was brutally murdered. The wicked man she believed was her father betrayed her. Her loyal subjects have been devastated by war. And the boy she gave her heart to broke it completely.  Now a dark queen has risen out of the ashes of her former life. Fury is blooming inside Dinah, poisoning her soul and twisting her mind. All she has left is Wonderland and her crown, and her obsession to fight for both. But the war rages on and Dinah could inherit a blood-stained throne. Can a leader filled with love and rage ever be the ruler her kingdom needs? Or will her all-consuming wrath bring Wonderland to its knees?  This is not a story of happily ever after.  This is the story of the Queen of Hearts.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Fantasy,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Someone else's summer [electronic resource]. Rachel Bateman.
abstracts: For fans of Julie Halpern and Morgan Matson comes a summer road trip story about adventure, sisters, and finding out who you truly want to be.  Anna's always idolized her older sister, Storm. So when Storm dies in a tragic car accident on the night of her high school graduation, Anna is completely lost and her family is torn apart. That is, until she finds Storm's summer bucket list and decides to honor her sister by having the best summer ever—which includes taking an epic road trip to the coast from her sleepy Iowa town. Setting out to do everything on Storm's list along with her sister's best friend Cameron—the boy next door—who knew that Storm's dream summer would eventually lead to Anna's own self-discovery?.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Romance,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: A lite too bright [electronic resource]. Samuel Miller.
abstracts: For fans of literary classics such as The Catcher in the Rye and The Perks of Being a Wallflower comes a stirring new thought-provoking novel from debut author Sam Miller about a loss shrouded in mystery with twists and turns down every railway.   Arthur Louis Pullman is on the verge of a breakdown.  He's been stripped of his college scholarship, is losing his grip on reality, and has been sent away to live with his aunt and uncle. It's there that Arthur discovers a journal written by his grandfather, the first Arthur Louis Pullman, an iconic Salinger-esque author who went missing the last week of his life and died hundreds of miles away from their family home.  What happened in that week—and how much his actions were influenced by his Alzheimer's—remains a mystery. But now Arthur has his grandfather's journal—and a final sentence containing a train route and a destination.  So Arthur embarks on a cross-country train ride to re-live his grandfather's last week, guided only by the clues left behind in the dementia-fueled journal. As Arthur gets closer to uncovering a sad and terrible truth, his journey is complicated by a shaky alliance with a girl who has secrets of her own and by escalating run-ins with a dangerous Pullman fan base.  Arthur's not the only one chasing a legacy—and some feel there is no cost too high for the truth.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Treasure island [electronic resource]. Robert Louis Stevenson.
abstracts: This performance was awarded Audio Best of the Year.—  Publishers Weekly     Jim Hawkins and his mother unlock a sea chest belonging to Billy Bones, an old sea captain who died while staying at their inn. Inside the chest was a logbook and map. Thus begins one of the greatest adventures of all time. Once again come aboard the Hispaniola in search of treasure with young Jim Hawkins, Dr. Livesey and Long John Silver.    In the summer of 1881 Stevenson's first novel was inspired when he was helping his wife's son learn how to draw. He explained, "...I made the map of an Island; it was elaborately and (I thought) beautifully coloured. The shape of it took my fancy beyond expression...I ticketed my performance Treasure Island."    Narrator Ralph Cosham has recorded more InAudio titles by far than any other narrator, and he has received numerous awards to include several Audio Best of the Year awards & Earphone awards.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Dragons in the waters [electronic resource] : O'keefe family series, book 2. Madeleine L'Engle.
abstracts: Thirteen-year-old Simon Renier has no idea when he boards the M.S. Orion with his cousin Forsyth Phair that their journey to Venezuela will be a dangerous one. His original plan―to return a family heirloom, a portrait of Simon Bolivar, to its rightful place―is sidetracked when cousin Forsyth is found murdered. When the portrait is stolen, all passengers and crew are suspects. Simon's newfound friends, Poly and Charles O'Keefe, and their scientist father help Simon try to find his painting, and his cousin's murderer. But will they succeed before they land? Or will the murderer and thief escape into the jungles of Venezuela?  From the Compact Disc edition.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Mystery,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: Field notes on love [electronic resource]. Jennifer E Smith.
abstracts: "Utterly romantic." —Jenny Han,    NYT    bestselling author of    To All the Boys I've Loved Before       The bestselling author of    Windfall    and    The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight    returns with a meet-cute romance about Hugo and Mae, two teens who are thrown together on a cross-country train trip that will teach them about love, each other, and the futures they can build for themselves.   It's the perfect idea for a romantic week together: traveling across America by train. But then Hugo's girlfriend dumps him. Her parting gift: the tickets for their long-planned last-hurrah-before-uni trip. Only, it's been booked under her name. Nontransferable, no exceptions. Mae is still reeling from being rejected from USC's film school. When she stumbles across Hugo's ad for a replacement Margaret Campbell (her full name!), she's certain it's exactly the adventure she needs to shake off her disappointment and jump-start her next film. A cross-country train trip with a complete stranger might not seem like the best idea. But to Mae and Hugo, both eager to escape their regular lives, it makes perfect sense. What starts as a convenient arrangement soon turns into something more. But when life outside the train catches up to them, can they find a way to keep their feelings for each other from getting derailed?  "One of the loveliest, most touching romances of 2019 thus far that gets at the nature of something deeply buried in all of our hearts." —   Entertainment Weekly    "This warm, romantic, never overly sentimental story is told with humor and heart....A deeply satisfying read about a life-changing journey full of poignant moments."    —Kirkus   , starred review.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Romance,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 世说新语故事 [electronic resource]. 杨春俏.
abstracts: 采用广受好评的林汉达《春秋故事》的笔法，从《世说新语》中选取有多则故事的人 物，以该人物为核心来写故事，力求表现人物的丰满性格和生动情韵。让孩子们在阅读故事的过程中，对魏晋名士有全面立体的认识，对魏晋时期的社会风气有所了解。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 中华军事故事 [electronic resource]. 张辉 .
abstracts: 本书精选了30余个中国古代的军事战争，以生动的语言，精彩的描写呈献给读者。每个故事后还链接有博闻馆，让读者在欣赏故事之余增加军事知识。此外，每个故事都配有精美的插图，以增强趣味性。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 中华名句故事 [electronic resource]. 黄蕊.
abstracts: 《中华经典故事》丛书其中一本。为帮助广大读者了解古代文化典籍，精选了58个经典名句。本书力求还原名句产生和发生的真实情境，重新演绎名句的精彩和厚重。在生动、跌宕、细节丰满的讲述当中，带领读者领略名句的丰富，帮助读者体会句子的精髓。可以说，本书是传统文化的一个小小缩影。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 中华寓言故事 [electronic resource]. 杨元美.
abstracts: 以生动活泼的语言重新讲解传统典籍中的寓言故事，文质兼美。链接内容既有现代故事，又有相关的古代文化常识，解读准确，趣味性强。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 中华学习故事 [electronic resource]. 刘莎.
abstracts: 以"学习"为主题，精选了各个朝代不同人物的故事，尽量摒弃大而空的故事，所选故事大都情节合理、细节生动，有一定的新鲜感。文笔流畅，不乏精彩出色之处。博闻馆和配图也能"锦上添花"。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 中华地理故事 [electronic resource]. 曹典.
abstracts: 本书用平易通俗的语言，生动讲述了我国境内奇特自然地理现象的故事。读者通过阅读故事，不仅学到了知识，了解到这些地理现象的存在，而且通过"地理探密"板块，对这些地理现象的科学成因有所认识，为今后进一步探索神奇的自然界打下基础，使本书起到寓教于乐的作用。同时，每篇故事配有"博闻馆"和相关图片，增加了本书的趣味性和可读性。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 中华成语故事 [electronic resource]. 孙智正.
abstracts: 本书精选小学语文教材中的成语，用生动有趣的文字以故事的形式讲述出来，让读者在轻松快乐中阅读，在不知不觉中增加积累。同时每篇故事都配有精美插图，图文并茂，更能吸引孩子的阅读注意力。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 中华对联故事 [electronic resource]. 刘太品.
abstracts: 对联作为世界上独一无二的艺术，蕴含哲理，发人深思；中国对联佳作无不表现出作者们的喜怒哀乐和才智学识，并在对联背后都有一段段动人的故事。本书图文并茂的讲述历史上有名的流传下来的经典的对联故事，适合中小学生阅读，并在每篇故事后加入博闻馆，旨在引导青少年读者更为深入地了解与原著相关的知识，开阔视野，加深对中华传统文化的了解。此外，一系列精美插图加强了全书的可读性和趣味性。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 红楼梦故事 [electronic resource]. 蒋芳仪.
abstracts: 《红楼梦故事》以曹雪芹所著《红楼梦》为依据，深入细致地选取了突出体现小说旨意的章回并加以改编，形成了既忠于原作又更为凝练的整体情节线索。全书的主体部分由50个故事组成，旨在以生动活泼的叙事语言和完整流畅的叙事结构，为广大青少年读者更好地了解《红楼梦》这部伟大的古典小说提供全新的视角和相对便捷的途径。每则故事后的"博闻馆"进一步展示了《红楼梦》背后深广的社会意义和历史文化价值，有利于充分拓展青少年读者的阅读视野，丰富他们的阅读体验。贯穿于故事中的插图，则极大地增强了本书的趣味性和可读性。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 史记故事 [electronic resource]. 张瑞利.
abstracts: 本书精选周公吐哺、毛遂自荐、卧薪尝胆、荆轲刺秦、破釜沉舟等经典史记故事四十五则。故事以浅近畅达的语言重新讲述，并配以丰富新颖的图片。每则故事后附"博闻馆"，链接与故事相关的其他故事或知识。该书兼具趣味性与知识性，力求在保留传统故事精髓的基础上，更加贴近当代读者的阅读。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 中华忠孝故事 [electronic resource]. 毕梦曦.

results.title: A heart in a body in the world [electronic resource]. Deb Caletti.
abstracts: SELECTED AS ONE OF THE YOUNG ADULT LIBRARY SERVICES ASSOCIATION'S 2019 AMAZING AUDIOBOOKS FOR YOUNG ADULTS! "This is one for the ages." —Gayle Forman, author of the #1 bestseller If I Stay "A book everyone should read right now." —The New York Times Book Review "A vital and heartbreaking story that brings together the #MeToo movement, the effects of gun violence, and the struggle of building oneself up again after crisis." —Elle "Equal parts heartbreaking and hopeful." —BookPage A Printz Honor Book Each step on Annabelle's 2,700 mile cross-country run brings her closer to facing a trauma from her past in National Book Award finalist Deb Caletti's novel about the heart, all the ways it breaks, and its journey to healing. Because sometimes against our will, against all odds, we go forward.Then... Annabelle's life wasn't perfect, but it was full—full of friends, family, love. And a boy...whose attention Anabelle found flattering and unsettling all at once. Until that attention intensified.  Now... Annabelle is running. Running from the pain and the tragedy from the past year. With only Grandpa Ed and the journal she fills with words she can't speak out loud, Anabelle runs from Seattle to Washington, DC, and toward a destination she doesn't understand but is determined to reach. With every beat of her heart, every stride of her feet, Anabelle steps closer to healing—and the strength she discovers within herself to let love and hope back into her life. Annabelle's journey is the ultimate testament to the human heart, and how it goes on after being broken.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Travel Literature,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 三字经故事 [electronic resource]. 马海鹏.
abstracts: 本书根据古代著名蒙学教材《三字经》编写而成，旨在让小读者通过轻松阅读故事，领悟传统经典内涵。形式为：节选原文，进行分段，配合文句含义，选编相关历史故事，或讲述典故，或阐述哲理，或表现美德，并在故事之后，附原文、注释、译文，帮助理解。书后附《三字经》全文，标注拼音，便于诵读。.

results.title: 资治通鉴故事 [electronic resource]. 陆令仪.
abstracts: 中国的史书浩如烟海，《资治通鉴》是其中的一部规模空前的巨著，由我国北宋时期著名史学家司马光主持编撰，记载了上下1300多年的历史，内容以政治、军事和民族关系方面的重要史实为主，兼及经济、文化和历史人物评价，博大精深。本书精选了原著中最为人称道的40多个独立完整的经典故事，用故事化的语言和视角，全方位、多层面地向读者呈现这部中华文明巨著，让历史读起来更轻松更有趣，让读者沉浸在丰富深广的历史经验中，使自己的人生阅历获得深化和拓展。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 汉字故事 [electronic resource]. 徐剑.

results.title: 中华英雄故事 [electronic resource]. 王晓日.

results.title: 韩非子故事 [electronic resource]. 郑传敏.
abstracts: 《韩非子故事》从治学、修身、养德、进言、纳言、为政、诡辩等方面选取了《韩非子》一书中四十余则故事，对其进行精心改编，使之更加符合当代读者的阅读习惯，并含蓄或直接地点明寓意之所在，从而带给读者一种全新的阅读体验，实现一种精神的"穿越"，换一种角度来感受先人的智慧。另外，本书按照简短、易懂、通俗、有趣的原则在部分故事后面附加了经典原文，对有些篇幅长、不易懂的原文做了简要的删节，并对经典原文做了简单注释，以帮助读者理解原文大意，以期引导读者在阅读故事的同时学习古代经典。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第11集 杨再兴 [electronic resource] : YANG ZAI XING. 季丁.
abstracts: 本集写宋高宗贪图苟安迁都，李纲辞朝，岳飞还乡，韩世忠留守润州。金兀术还师黄龙府，再议进攻中原。哈迷蚩荐用秦桧作内应。昏君不察，封秦桧为礼部尚书。绍兴七年，四方豪杰不满朝廷纷纷起义，杨再兴竖义旗声势浩大。岳飞奉诏平杨再兴，劝他归顺。杨再兴不满昏君，不肯归顺，和岳飞约定，决胜负只许单打，不许旁人助战。岳云解粮回营误犯军令。岳飞责子送请杨再兴验伤。杀手锏破杨家枪，岳飞义服杨再兴。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第10集 黄天荡 [electronic resource] : HUANG TIAN DANG. 波心.
abstracts: 本集写岳飞在牛头山联合各路勤王兵，大败兀术。金兵经水路向北流窜，被韩世忠的水军在狼福山下阻截。兀术夜上金山寺几乎被擒。韩世忠妻梁红玉策划破敌，亲自击鼓指挥，大获全胜。金兵夜渡受挫后退入黄天荡死港，贪秀才献计掘通河道，金兵逃走。天长关岳云活捉假兀术，回营被责。金军远遁，岳、韩班师回朝。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第7集 藕塘关 [electronic resource] : OU TANG GUAN. 宋仪.
abstracts: 本集写岳飞平服了杨虎和余化龙后，命他们合力抗金。金兀术分兵攻打藕塘、汜水两关。牛皋酒醉破金兵，岳飞因牛皋招亲事，废除军中临阵不得招亲令。刘豫之子刘猊行凶，孟邦杰被逼出走，引出呼天庆等四员大将归宋。粘罕兵败藕塘关。诸葛英、董先、何元庆归顺岳飞。高宗下旨命岳飞进军湖广，镇压杨么。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 雷曹 [electronic resource] : LEI CAO. 光亮.
abstracts: 乐生与雷曹邂逅。乐生得知雷曹落魄人间，便慷慨相 助；雷曹预知乐生有难，便全力以救，以报知己。二人患 难相扶，情深义重。后来雷曹归位，二人人间天上，相见 时难，但挚友情谊，仍永生不忘。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第8集 牛头山 [electronic resource] : NIU TOU SHAN. 徐光玉.
abstracts: 本集写岳飞奉旨去镇压杨么后，金兵得知岳飞远在湖广，金陵空虚，于是分五路进攻中原。金陵陷落，李纲等人保高宗逃至牛头山。岳飞率领众将上山保驾。牛皋下山解粮，收了高宠等三兄弟；后来又到金营下战书，戏弄了兀术。两军交战，高宠枪挑十余辆铁滑车，壮烈牺牲。金兀术派人到汤阴岳家庄去劫持岳母，想以此来削弱岳飞的斗志。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第3集 岳母刺字 [electronic resource] : YUE MU CI ZI. 徐光玉.
abstracts: 本集写赵佶宣和四年，金国皇帝派金兀术领兵攻打中原。潞安州节度使陆登两次击败金兵，后因援兵不至，城破殉国。两狼关总兵韩世忠夫妇英勇抗敌，但关口不慎被炮炸出缺口，导致失关。金兀术渡黄河直逼京城，张邦昌献媚求和，求和未成，徽、钦二帝被伴。康王赵构在商丘登位自立高宗，做起了半壁江山的皇帝。徐仁解粮，奉旨聘岳飞。岳飞临行前，岳母在岳飞背上刺了 “精忠报 国”四字训子。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第12集 小商河 [electronic resource] : XIAO SHANG HE. 曹作锐.
abstracts: 本集写金兵乘岳飞镇压杨么之际，又侵入中原。岳飞奉旨去救朱仙镇。杨再兴独自杀死四员金邦大将，误陷淤泥，战死小商河。岳云等六将先行激战金兵。岳、韩大军齐集朱仙镇，岳飞亲祭，哭葬杨再兴。兀术因进兵不利，密信嘱秦桧在朝中策应。秦桧媚君弄权，派新科状元张九成到五国城去问候被俘虏的徽、钦二帝。汤怀自告奋勇护送张九成过敌营。金兵将恃众战汤怀。汤怀不敌，义不受辱，自刎全节。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第15集 风波亭 [electronic resource] : FENG BO TING. 子聪.
abstracts: 本集写岳飞连奉十二道金牌催促进京。他把印信交给牛皋和施全执掌，带了王横上路。一路军民挽留依依不舍。瓜州金山寺岳飞述志：将身许国。行至平江岳飞被秦桧派来的校尉拿解入京，王横被杀。秦桧派大理寺正卿周三畏审问逼供，周三畏不满奸臣所为，挂冠出走。万俟卨严刑拷岳飞。岳云、张宪同下狱。张保探监悲愤自杀。王氏东窗献计：黄柑藏书害岳飞。除夕夜岳飞忠贞不二志，风波亭英雄同死难。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第4集 青龙山 [electronic resource] : QING LONG SHAN. 冯香生.
abstracts: 本集写岳飞入朝受封。在辞驾之前，岳飞的红萝山结拜兄弟吉青率人马来 投军。行至八盘山，岳飞率领的先行部队，一举歼灭三千多金兵，二队刘豫忌妒 冒功。第二次，在险峻的青龙山，岳飞以八百多宋兵战败十万金兵，刘豫又冒 功。张所元帅派中军胡先乔装探得真情，元帅升帐议擒刘豫。自私自利的两淮 节度使曹荣报密，刘豫降金。岳飞奉命守黄河，张所带兵攻汗梁。张邦昌向皇后 骗去传国玉玺，到南京去投奔高宗。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第13集 双枪陆文龙 [electronic resource] : SHUANG QIANG LU WEN LONG. 朱光玉.
abstracts: 本集写陆登之子陆文龙被金兀术收为义子抚养长大。陆文龙不知自已身世，随兀术进中原作战，十分骁勇。岳营诸将屡次轮战，不能取胜。王佐施“苦肉计”斩断右臂，请命到金营去说降，以说故事打动陆文龙，决心报仇雪恨。陆文龙又说通了曹宁，曹宁回国，大义灭亲。金兵使用连环马，被岳军击败；再用铁浮陀，被陆文龙用箭书通知宋营，又一次失败。陆文龙、王佐立功归宋。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第14集 大破金龙阵 [electronic resource] : DA PO JIN LONG ZHEN. 高梅仪.
abstracts: 本集写金兀术攻打宋营失败，哈迷蚩献计，摆金龙绞尾阵。岳、韩、张、刘四元帅合力破阵退敌。狄雷、樊成、关铃等投效战金兵。岳云、严成方、何元庆、狄雷八大锤大闹朱仙镇。刘琦伏兵射兀术。兀术逃窜金牛岭。哈迷蚩被派往临安见秦桧，密谋杀害岳飞。皇帝昏庸，和议告成，岳飞进兵收复失地的计划失败，不得已奉诏回京。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第6集 大战爱华山 [electronic resource] : DA ZHAN AI HUA SHAN. 杨青华.
abstracts: 本集写金兀术亲领金兵三十万攻打黄河口，刘豫为了博取金兀术赏识勾结曹荣献黄河。吉青酒醉误事，岳飞、牛皋等赶来，在爱华山布伏兵，命吉青诱金兀术入山。金兀术几乎被擒。岳飞率兵追击，败金兀术于麒麟山。麒麟山的英雄张国祥、狮子山的英雄董芳误战牛皋、王贵。在黄河口，梁山好汉阮小二之子阮良水擒金兀术，但又被挣脱。岳飞正要造船追击，忽接圣旨命他到太湖镇压杨虎。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第5集 岳飞挂帅 [electronic resource] : YUE FEI GUA SHUAI. 冯香生.
abstracts: 本集写张邦昌向高宗献玉玺被封为右丞相，又将婢女荷香认作干女儿送入后宫媚取赵构欢心，阴谋断送国家。李纲忧国，荐张保到岳飞军营效力。张邦昌设计害岳飞，假仁假义保举岳飞为元帅。岳飞奉诏进京，断桥渡口收王横。岳飞进了京城，张邦昌诬告岳飞图谋不轨，李纲力保。牛皋等聚义太行，闻讯发兵救岳飞。岳飞辩明冤屈，张邦昌被废为庶民，逐出南京。赵构拜岳飞为元帅，命牛皋等随军抗金，十万大军北进。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第2集 枪挑小梁王 [electronic resource] : QIANG TIAO XIAO LIANG WANG. 高梅仪.
abstracts: 本集写岳飞等到相州考武举，中军洪先因勒索他们而被逐出节度使衙门。岳飞成亲回原籍，结义兄弟一同迁居汤阴；迁居途中，洪先欲报前仇，被岳飞 消灭。岳飞等进京考试，小梁王贿通张邦昌要夺武状元。其间，牛皋私自外出， 单战杨再兴、罗延庆闹出大笑话；逛古董店时，岳飞得湛卢宝剑。在考场上，小梁王仗势欺人，被岳飞枪挑丧命。牛皋等大闹武场，宗泽等放走岳飞，岳飞哭辞辕门。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第1集 岳飞出世 [electronic resource] : YUE FEI CHU SHI. 高梅仪.
abstracts: 本集写岳飞出生三天，就碰到黄河洪水暴发，他的母亲抱着他坐在荷花缸里逃命。荷花缸漂到麒麟村，王明夫妇收留岳飞母子在家中居住。岳飞童年受母亲的教诲，热爱劳动，努力学习，生 活十分俭朴，后拜周侗老师为义父，尽心习武，并与王贵、张显、 汤怀等小友结为兄弟。岳飞随周侗游沥泉、访志明和尚时，得兵书武器。在参加武科童子试时，被县官李春招婿，并得一名马。乱草岗牛皋劫路，被岳飞打服，结拜兄弟后，一同筹划到相州会试。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 第9集 岳云 [electronic resource] : YUE YUN. 高梅仪.
abstracts: 本集写岳飞的长子岳云，虽然只有十五、六岁，却武艺高强，英勇异常。牛皋催粮到岳家庄，岳云要求跟着去抗金，牛皋因他年幼没有答应。当金兵偷渡黄河袭击岳家庄时，岳云率领庄客打退前来劫夺岳母的金兵。后又私自出奔，欲上牛头山随父抗击金兵，路遇梁山好汉大刀关胜的儿子关铃，结为兄弟。在牛头山前，救了牛皋，并将金营勇将金弹子一锤击毙，立下战功。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 促织 [electronic resource] : CU ZHI. 王育生.
abstracts: 皇帝喜爱斗蟋蟀的游戏，要各地进献优种蟋蟀。官吏 借此发财，百姓却因此遭殃。故事通过穷书生成名一家的 不幸遭遇，深刻地揭露了封建帝王、官吏的腐败和迫害百 姓的罪恶。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 红玉 [electronic resource] : HONG YU. 王育生.
abstracts: 红玉是个狐精。她侠肝义胆，温柔多情，初与冯生相 爱，婚姻受阻，便热心助冯生另寻配偶，后冯生遭难，她 暗中助他抚孤,最后携冯生之子与冯生团聚，而且亲自劳 作，帮助冯生重创家业，日子过得幸福美满。作者蒲松龄在这个美丽的故事中，寄寓了他鲜明的爱 憎，鞭挞了封建社会的黑暗势力，颂扬了平民中热心助人、 勤劳创业的美德。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 鉴真 [electronic resource] : JIAN ZHEN. 梧柏、蒋华.
abstracts: 中日两国，地理上一衣带水，文化上脉络相通。两千年来，我们祖先中有多少杰出人物，为两国人民的友好，曾作出巨大贡献。唐代鉴真和尚就是其中突出的一位，他为了东渡日本，历尽千辛万苦，战胜重重阻力，历时十二载，才完成夙愿。他不仅把佛教戒律，而且也把唐代文化带到了日本，广泛传播了中日人民间的友谊种子。因此，直到今天，鉴真和尚始终受到中日两国人民的尊敬和怀念。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 哈迈 [electronic resource] : HA MAI. 向辛.
abstracts: 天上的霸主古谍阴险恶毒，欺压人间的百姓。哈迈以自己的勇 敢和智慈战胜了古谍。最后，为反抗恶势力的压迫，哈迈和自己的 心上人被迫双双携手跳下山崖。传说俩人并没有死，而是化成两股 并流的清泉。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 聂小倩 [electronic resource] : NIE XIAO QIAN. 立华.
abstracts: 聂小倩是个孤苦无依、不幸早逝的少女。她不甘心受 到妖魅的凌辱，决心委托秀才宁采臣拯救自己脱离苦海， 并得到侠客燕赤霞的帮助，最终与宁采臣结成美满姻缘。作者蒲松龄笔下的聂小倩美丽善良，秀才宁采臣正直 豪爽，侠客燕赤霞肝胆照人。故事颂扬了不爱美女金钱和 敢于扫除邪恶的正人君子，而害人的妖魔鬼怪必然受到应 有的惩罚。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 穆桂英挂帅 [electronic resource] : MU GUI YING GUA SHUAI. 高梅仪.
abstracts: 北宋爱国英雄杨家将，在几次艰苦激烈地抗辽战争中，几乎全部 牺牲了。杨业的妻子佘太君和孙媳妇椁桂英，都已退休住在乡下.这时辽邦又出兵侵略略中原，佘太君听了非常担心朝中缺少将帅， 就派重孙杨文广、重孙女杨金花到京城去打听消息。文广和全花到了京城，正赶上比武点帅。文广.金花忍不住参加 比武，夺得了帅印。朝廷因为他们年纪太小，只能作先行，下旨叫文广的母亲穆桂英挂帅抵抗辽邦。穆桂英对朝廷忠奸不明的事还没有忘记，杨家又只有文广一根 独苗，不愿接印。经过佘太君用大义劝告，她明白了国事为重，才打 消了自己的消极想法，接了帅印，召集杨家将旧部，毅然担负起抗敌 的重任。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 秦香莲 [electronic resource] : QIN XIANG LIAN. 盛强.
abstracts: 宋朝书生陈士美考中状元，因为贪图财富，隐瞒了家中已有妻儿，被皇帝招为女婿。他的妻子秦香莲，在公婆贫病过世后，带着儿女，找到京城。陈士美不认。三朝元老王延龄让泰香莲扮作卖唱的妇人，在寿堂上唱出身世，希望打动陈士美，不料想反被赶出京城。陈士美派韩琪追杀母子三人，企图灭口，幸得韩琪舍命相救。 秦香莲告到开封府大堂，包拯不顾皇姑和国太的威胁，替她伸了冤， 把陈士美处以极刑。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 西厢记 [electronic resource] : XI XIANG JI. 洪曾玲.
abstracts: 这本画册是根据元代剧作家王实甫的名著《西厢记》改编的。这部作品通过对崔莺莺和张君瑞之间悲欢离合的描写。鞭笞了封建礼教，表达了封建时代青年男女追求婚姻自由，向往幸福生活的美好愿望。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 杨乃武与小白菜 [electronic resource] : YANG NAI WU YU XIAO BAI CAI. 笑民.
abstracts: “杨乃武与小白菜”.是流传很广的一件清末冤狱故事。浙江余杭县官刘锡彤的儿子，强奸了一个叫小白菜的妇女，并害死她的丈夫。刘锡彤审理此案时，却把因奸杀人的罪名推到仇人杨乃武的头上。后来，虽经几次上告，因各级官吏都受了刘锡彤的贿赂，狼狈为奸，结果，仍然判处杨乃武和小白菜死刑。杨乃武的姐姐杨淑英为了替兄弟伸冤，亲自到京城去告御状，恰巧碰到宫廷内部斗争， 慈禧太后因要争权夺势，就利用重审这件冤案的机会，来打击浙江的地方官吏，因此，这两条性命才侥幸地从冤死的边沿上保全下来。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 会说话的瓷人 [electronic resource] : HUI SHUO HUA DE CI REN. 王陵.
abstracts: 故事反映封建统治时代，劳动人民遭受官府迫害的痛苦，和他 们之间为爱不怕栖牲的精神。故事结尾写出了牺牲者诅咒的仇恨。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 状元与乞丐 [electronic resource] : ZHUANG YUAN YU QI GAI. 杨树玉.
abstracts: 这是裉据同名戏曲改编的连环画。它写了丁氏兄弟同年同月同日 各生一子，一个取名文龙，一个名文凤。舅爷王国贤自命精通算卜，断 定文龙是乞丐命，文凤为状元命。文龙的母亲柳氏不信天命，在逆境之 中立志教子成材。而文凤父母迷信天命，对文凤命中注定中状元的说法 信而不疑，因而对儿子百般娇惯溺爱，纵子无度，落得家破子毁。整个 故事生动地告诉人们，应该怎样对待子女的教育。它批判了反动荒诞的 “天命观”，颂扬了 “人怀壮志，无运亦能自通”的进取精神。从中可以得到有益的启示和鉴戒。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 猎人占布 [electronic resource] : LIE REN ZHAN BU. 益西单增.
abstracts: 很久很久以前，我们西藏的老百姓很苦，许许多 多的人把改变现状的要求和希望，寄托在寺庙和菩 萨身上。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 种梨 [electronic resource] : ZHONG LI. 王育生.
abstracts: 吝畜成性的财主“铁公鸡”卖梨，老道向他讨一个，他 就是不给。于是老道略施法术，把“铁公鸡”的一车梨变 成自己刚种的，分给大伙儿吃了，狠狠地惩罚了 “铁公鸡” 一次。故事新奇有趣，耐人寻味。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 桃花扇 [electronic resource] : TAO HUA SHAN. 鲁西.
abstracts: 《桃花扇》以侯方域、李香君的爱情故事为线索，集中地反映了明 末腐朽、动荡的社会现实及统治阶级内部的矛盾和斗争，“谱离合之 情，写兴亡之感。”描绘出明清易代时的厂阔社会生活画卷。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 牛郎织女 [electronic resource] : NIU LANG ZHI NV. 杨春峰.
abstracts: 王母娘娘为了破坏牛郎星和织女星的爱情，硬把牛郎 贬到人间。牛郎在老牛的帮助下，把织女带到了人间。他 们结为夫妻，生下一儿一女。王母娘娘得知后，派金甲二神把织女捉回天庭。牛郎担起一双儿女追赶。王母娘娘却 用神簪在他们之间画出一条大河。从此牛郎和织女就被隔 在了滔滔河水的两端。喜鹊看不过，每年七夕之夜，就有 无数只喜飞来搭上一座鹊桥，让他们一家人团聚。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 梁山伯与祝英台 [electronic resource] : LIANG SHAN BO YU ZHU YING TAI. 司徒佩韦.
abstracts: 这是一个民间传说。在古老的封建社会里，有一个热爱自由的女子祝英台，她巧妙地说服了顽固的父亲，女扮男装去杭州求学，半路上遇见也到杭州求学的少年梁山伯，两个人结拜了兄弟。他们同学三年，有了深厚、纯洁的感情、当祝英台被家中催迫回去时，梁山伯送了她十八里路，英台一再暗示她是女子，山伯始终不解；分别时英台就假意给她的妹子做媒，要山伯一个月内到她家去求亲。但是英台到家，她父亲已把她许配给有财有势的马太守的儿子马文才了。不管英台怎样反抗，也无法改变她父亲嫌贫爱富的主意。等山伯到来，知道英台实是女子，对自己有一片真心，但两人却再也不能结合了，他就愤懑病死。英台被逼出嫁，花轿经过山伯的坟墓，下轿痛哭，坟墓忽然裂开，她就跳了进去。后来人们同情他们的遭遇，敬爱英台的反抗意志，就想像他们死后化了一对蝴蝶，永远在一起飞翔。本书主要根据南薇、宋之由等编写的越剧剧本编绘。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 孔雀东南飞 [electronic resource] : KONG QUE DONG NAN FEI. 邵甄、吴廷琯.
abstracts: 东汉末建安年间，一个名叫刘兰芝的少妇，美丽、善良、聪明 而勤劳。她与焦仲卿结婚后，夫妻俩互敬互爱，感情深挚，不料偏执顽固 的焦母却看她不顺眼，百般挑剔，并威逼焦仲卿将她驱逐。焦仲卿迫于母 命，无奈只得劝说兰芝暂避娘家，待日后再设法接她回家。分手时两人盟 誓，永不相负。谁知兰芝回到娘家后，趋炎附势的哥哥逼她改嫁太守的儿 子。焦仲卿闻讯赶来，两人约定“黄泉下相见”，最后在太守儿子迎亲的 那天，双双殉情而死。死后两人双双化鸟，告诫世人。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 将相和 [electronic resource] : JIANG XIANG HE. 任率英.
abstracts: 战国时期，赵国老将廉颇英勇善战而有些届功自傲。一日，秦王假意以十五城交换赵国的国宝——和氏璧。蔺 相如冒死携璧赴秦，得知泰王并无换璧诚意，想方设法完 璧归赵。后来，秦王又在渑池设宴邀请赵王。席间，秦王 叫赵王鼓瑟侮辱赵王，反被蔺相如所辱。蔺相如连立大 功，被封为宰相。廉颇将军很不服气，几次想污辱蔺相 如，蔺相如都忍让躲避开了。后来廉颇得知将相和睦，别 国才不敢来侵略赵国，于是他负荆请罪，将相和好。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 昭君出塞 [electronic resource] : ZHAO JUN CHU SAI. 穆一衡、熊侃.
abstracts: 西汉时期，汉元帝听说越州女子王昭君长得很好看， 就想选作嫔妃。可是，画师毛延寿向王家索贿不成，便 故意在昭君画像面部添了疤痣，还说『左痣右疤，亡国败 家J。昭君无端地被囚禁深宫。一日，元帝来后宫闲游， 循声见得昭君。昭君哭诉受害经过，元帝十分恼怒。毛延 寿得知后，畏罪潜逃匈奴，并挑起匈奴入侵汉朝。匈奴军 队长驱直入，直逼长安。为保全国家，昭君自愿出塞和 番。到了匈奴，昭君让匈奴写下降书，对汉称臣，并将毛 延寿斩首，遂i而死。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 崂山道士 [electronic resource] : LAO SHAN DAO SHI. 王育生.
abstracts: 王七跑到崂山求仙学道，但受不了苦，两个月就回了 家。回家后他忘了师傅的告诫，在众人面前表演他仅学到 的一点儿遇墙无阻的法术，结果法术不灵，碰得头破血流。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 人参姑娘 [electronic resource] : REN SHEN GU NIANG. 王兆田.
abstracts: 长白山上有一苗六品叶参，结出人参籽，转化成了人参姑娘。人参 姑娘见山下牛倌老实厚道，心地善良，便与他结为夫妻，相依为命。山里有黑蛇精，想霸占人参姑娘，竟施毒计使村人染上瘟疫。为了 救乡亲，人参姑娘自我牺性，献出珍贵的参籽，自己又变成了六品叶参。山里有黑蛇精，想霸占人参姑娘，竟施毒计使村人染上瘟疫。为了 救乡亲，人参姑娘自我牺性，献出珍贵的参籽，自己又变成了六品叶参。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 孟姜女 [electronic resource] : MENG JIANG NV. 余金.
abstracts: 秦始皇吞并六国后，怕人民造反，采取“焚书坑儒”的政策。有个叫万喜良的年轻人，不忍烧掉自己心爱的书，便逃到孟员外的花园里躲藏起来。 孟员外夫妇很喜欢万喜良，便招他为婿，与自己的女儿孟姜女成了亲。但此事终被官府知道了，将万喜良捉拿并发配到边地去修建长城。孟姜女思念丈夫，赶制了棉衣，千里迢迢寻找万喜良。她来到长城边看到一堆堆的白骨，料想丈夫已离开了人世，便痛哭起来。谁料，她的哭声竟使长城倒塌了一角。秦始皇强要孟姜女入宫，孟姜女借机要他搭建祭坛，祭奠万喜良和死去的几十万苦役。在祭奠仪式上，孟姜女大骂泰始皇是个暴君，他的天下不能长久，然后纵身投河自尽了。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 女娲补天 [electronic resource] : NV WA BU TIAN. 伊黎.
abstracts: 女娲是传说中的一位女神，她用黄泥照 自己的样子捏了很多小娃娃。娃娃活了，自 称是「人』，都叫女娲做妈妈。女娲非常爱「人』替人制造笙簧?，让 男女结成婚姻，传宗接代。人世间渐渐繁荣 起来了。不料火神和水神打仗撞倒了撑天的 不周山。一时间,天塌下半边,天河的水倾 泻下来，很多人被淹死；地上起了火，很多 人被烧伤；地陷了，黑龙钻出来作害。女娲 扑灭了大火，杀死了黑龙，又费了极大的力 气，炼石为浆，把天补好。人类重新过上幸 福的生活。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 牡丹亭 [electronic resource] : MU DAN TING. 高珊、王森.
abstracts: 《牡丹亭》是汤显祖最杰出的剧作，歌颂了青年男女大胆追求自由爱情、坚决反对封建礼教的精神，揭露、批判了“存天理，灭人欲”的虚伪和残酷，形成了对封建社会没落时期思想文化专制的一次冲击。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 白蛇传 [electronic resource] : BAI SHE ZHUAN. 春山.
abstracts: 峨眉山的两条小灵蛇因羡慕人间美好生活，变化成人来到人间。其中一个叫白娘子的与书生许仙一见钟情，遂结为夫妻。可是，金山寺凶僧法海百般破坏他们夫妻关系。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature

results.title: 杜十娘 [electronic resource] : DU SHI NIANG. 新平、新英.
abstracts: 明朝万历年间，京城里有个名妓叫杜十娘，人很聪明美丽。有一天，一位来京赶考的公子名叫李曱的来逛妓院，两人一见倾心。李甲没有考中，更加迷恋杜十娘。十娘见他真诚，便把自己的积蓄拿出一部分， 让李甲凑一部分，赎了身子，嫁给李甲。李甲带十娘回家，路上想到父亲为官多年，很重名声，见他带妓女回家一定恼怒。因此，非常烦闷。恰巧，在瓜州遇到盐商孙富，孙富看中了十娘，又摸透了李甲的心思，便用一套功名富贲，纲常大义的言辞说动李甲，要李甲把十娘卖给他。李甲以为妓女人人可以为夫，孙富比自己有钱，十娘一定能够同意，自己从此也可摆脱烦恼，便欣然同意了。 十娘知道自己所追求的幸福已经破灭，非常痛心。在孙富交钱要人的时 候，她拿出自己多年的积蓄一价值万金的百宝箱给大家看，痛责了李甲、孙富，便悲愤地抱着百宝箱跳江自杀了。.
results.subjects: Young Adult Fiction,Classic Literature,Non-English Fiction,Young Adult Literature
